price: 77. Pues son enemigos míos, (y no adoro) salvo al Señor de toda la creación;
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
